amendment.description: An amendment numbered 56 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to reduce the salary of Gene Rodrigues, Assistant Secretary for Electricity for the Office of Electricity, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pfluger amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 250 (Roll no. 552).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pfluger amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 250 (Roll no. 552).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
